name: Kenneth E. Jansen
content: Jansen, Kenneth E | CU Experts | CU Boulder Close Contact Info Email Curriculum Vitae Publications in VIVO Co-author Network Map of Science Research Areas Aerodynamics Aeromechanics Aeronautical/Astronautical Engineering Artificial Intelligence/Cybernetics Biomechanics Biomedical Engineering Cardiovascular Diseases Cardiovascular System Computational Mechanics Flow Control Fluid Dynamics Mechanics Nuclear Engineering Respiratory System Turbulence Research research overview Dr. Jansen's teaching and research interests are focused on computational fluid dynamics. He specializes in massively parallel simulations using unstructured/adaptive grids. Applications include aerospace (with an emphasis on flow control and turbulence), cardiovascular flows, and two-phase flows. keywords computational fluid dynamics, flow control, aerodynamics, multiphase flows, cardiovascular flows, respiratory flows Publications selected publications chapter Finite element methods for turbulence. 189-234. 2023 Chapter 15 Extreme Scale Unstructured Adaptive CFD for Aerodynamic; Flow Control 2017 Numerical Study of Turbulent Pipe Flow with Transverse Magnetic Field Using a Spectral/Finite Element Solver.
